verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> if you have become <S%H6148>collateral<s%> for your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> if you have <S%H8628>struck<s%> your <S%H3709>hands<s%> in pledge for a <S%H2114>stranger;<s%>
You are <S%H3369>trapped<s%> by the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> You are <S%H3920>ensnared<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H6213>Do<s%> this <S%H645>now,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H935>yourself,<s%> since you have come into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H7511>humble<s%> <S%H7292>yourself.<s%> Press your plea with your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> no <S%H8142>sleep<s%> to your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> nor <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to your <S%H6079>eyelids.<s%>
<S%H5337>Free<s%> <S%H6643>yourself,<s%> like a gazelle from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6833>hunter,<s%> like a bird from the <S%H3027>snare<s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler.<s%>
<S%H3212>Go<s%> to the <S%H5244>ant,<s%> you <S%H6102>sluggard.<s%> <S%H7200>Consider<s%> her <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise;<s%>
which having no <S%H7101>chief,<s%> <S%H7860>overseer,<s%> or <S%H4910>ruler,<s%>
<S%H3559>provides<s%> her <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer,<s%> and <S%H103>gathers<s%> her <S%H3978>food<s%> in the <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>
How long will you <S%H7901>sleep,<s%> <S%H6102>sluggard?<s%> When will you <S%H6965>arise<s%> out of your <S%H8142>sleep?<s%>
A <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep:<s%>
so your <S%H7389>poverty<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> as a <S%H1980>robber,<s%> and your <S%H4270>scarcity<s%> as an <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
A <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H120>person,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> is he who <S%H1980>walks<s%> with a <S%H6143>perverse<s%> <S%H6310>mouth;<s%>
who <S%H7169>winks<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> who <S%H4448>signals<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> who <S%H3384>motions<s%> with his <S%H676>fingers;<s%>
in whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H8419>perverseness,<s%> who devises <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>continually,<s%> who <S%H6256>always<s%> <S%H7971>sows<s%> <S%H4066>discord.<s%>
Therefore his <S%H343>calamity<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly.<s%> He will be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H6621>suddenly,<s%> and that without <S%H4832>remedy.<s%>
There are <S%H8337>six<s%> things which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8130>hates;<s%> <S%H7651>yes,<s%> seven which are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H5315>him:<s%>
<S%H7311>haughty<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> that <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%>
a <S%H3820>heart<s%> that <S%H2790>devises<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4284>schemes,<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> that are <S%H4116>swift<s%> in <S%H7323>running<s%> to <S%H7451>mischief,<s%>
a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> who <S%H6315>utters<s%> <S%H3577>lies,<s%> and he who <S%H7971>sows<s%> <S%H4090>discord<s%> among <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> and <S%H5203>don't<s%> forsake your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8451>teaching.<s%>
<S%H7194>Bind<s%> them <S%H8548>continually<s%> on your <S%H3820>heart.<s%> <S%H6029>Tie<s%> them around your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
When you <S%H1980>walk,<s%> it will <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H7901>you.<s%> When you sleep, it will <S%H8104>watch<s%> over <S%H6974>you.<s%> When you awake, it will talk with <S%H7878>you.<s%>

For the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is a <S%H5216>lamp,<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H216>light.<s%> <S%H8433>Reproofs<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction<s%> are the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1870>life,<s%>
to <S%H8104>keep<s%> you from the <S%H7451>immoral<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> from the <S%H2513>flattery<s%> of the wayward <S%H5237>wife<s%>'s <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
<S%H2530>Don't<s%> lust after her <S%H3308>beauty<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> neither let her <S%H3947>captivate<s%> you with her <S%H6079>eyelids.<s%>

For <S%H802>a<s%> <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H1157>reduces<s%> you to a <S%H3603>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread.<s%> The <S%H802>adulteress<s%> <S%H6679>hunts<s%> for your <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H5315>life.<s%>
Can a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2846>scoop<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> into his <S%H2436>lap,<s%> and his <S%H899>clothes<s%> not be <S%H8313>burned?<s%>
Or can <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> on hot <S%H1513>coals,<s%> and his <S%H7272>feet<s%> not be <S%H3554>scorched?<s%>
So is he who goes <S%H935>in<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%> Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> her will not be <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
Men <S%H936>don't<s%> despise a <S%H1590>thief,<s%> if he <S%H1589>steals<s%> to <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> when he is <S%H7456>hungry:<s%>
but if he is <S%H4672>found,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> <S%H7659>seven<s%> <S%H5414>times.<s%> He shall give all the <S%H1952>wealth<s%> of his <S%H1004>house.<s%>
He who commits <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding.<s%> He who <S%H6213>does<s%> it <S%H7843>destroys<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
He will <S%H4672>get<s%> <S%H5061>wounds<s%> and <S%H7036>dishonor.<s%> His <S%H2781>reproach<s%> will not be wiped <S%H4229>away.<s%>
For <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> arouses the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of the <S%H1397>husband.<s%> He <S%H2550>won't<s%> spare in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance.<s%>
He <S%H5375>won't<s%> regard any <S%H3724>ransom,<s%> neither will he rest <S%H14>content,<s%> though you give <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7810>gifts.<s%>
